api_list.api_description: Fetch a single Federal Register document using the FR document number.
Returns summary information about agency awards.

required_parameters.name: toptier_agency_code
required_parameters.description: The code for the top-tier agency.

query: I need detailed information on a specific Federal Register document with the document number 2022-09876, and I also want to know about the award summary for the Department of Education. How can I find this information?
